title: MongoDB says customer data was exposed in a cyberattack
description: MongoDB is warning that its corporate systems were breached and that customer data was exposed in a cyberattack that was detected by the company earlier this week. [...]

title: QNAP VioStor NVR vulnerability actively exploited by malware botnet
description: A Mirai-based botnet named 'InfectedSlurs' is exploiting a remote code execution (RCE) vulnerability in QNAP VioStor NVR (Network Video Recorder) devices to hijack and make them part of its DDoS (distributed denial of service) swarm. [...]

title: Microsoft unveils new, more secure Windows Protected Print Mode
description: Microsoft announced a new Windows Protected Print Mode (WPP), introducing significant security enhancements to the Windows print system. [...]
